categories: Category:Star Wars Galaxy of Adventures episodes

nodes.text: "Black Spire Outpost" is the fifty-second episode of Star Wars Galaxy of Adventures. It premiered on the Star Wars Kids YouTube channel on August 27, 2020.

The narrator announces that at Galaxy's Edge, Black Spire Outpost is full of danger, mystery, and wonder. The episode opens with a wide landscape shot of Black Spire Outpost's spaceport. Chewbacca exits the Millennium Falcon with a porg on top of a box.

The porg flies away and explores the town, visiting Dok-Ondar's Den of Antiquities, where it avoids being trampled by the patrons. It flies to the enclosed encounter and eyes Dok-Ondar, who waves him away. Meanwhile, the DJ droid R-3X plays music at Oga's Cantina. The porg briefly dances on his keyboard before mingling under the drink dispensers. The porg then flies through the streets of Merchant Row, hiding behind a pillar while two patrolling First Order stormtroopers march past. It sees the Resistance spy Vi Moradi hiding in a corner but she motions for the porg not to expose her position.

The porg visits Ronto Roasters in the Market where the 8D-series smelter droid 8D-J8 is roasting some meat on grills. The porg tries to taste some meat but is picked up by a disapproving Chewbacca. A Kowakian monkey-lizard laughs maniacally in the background.
